Key Match Events: LeBron James played despite expressing frustration about traveling to Milwaukee for the game.
LeBron James finished with 11 points, six rebounds and four assists.
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron James expressed frustration about traveling to Milwaukee for the game.
LeBron shared how his son Bronny's presence motivates him.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James mentioned it's a pure joy to be able to come to work every day, put in the hard work, work with his son every day and be able to see him continue to grow.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers improved to a 1-2 record in the preseason.
LeBron James made history in the preseason debut by playing alongside his son Bronny James.
